document_data.name: Kiki
document_data.mainbody: '''Kiki''' was an [[elf]] [[wizard]] and a student of the [[Neverwinter Academy]] in [[Neverwinter]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Like almost all the other students of the Neverwinter Academy, Kiki was fond of [[Aribeth de Tylmarande|Lady Aribeth]] and was grateful that she didn't blame all the wizards for the spreading of the [[Wailing Death]] and events in Neverwinter.
document_data.Relationships: During the graduation ceremonies in 1372 DR, Kiki was chatting with fellow students [[Deelin]] and [[Fonlim]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Kiki finished her studies and was one of the eight students, among whom was the future [[Hero of Neverwinter]], present at the graduation ceremony that year. During the ceremony led by Lady Aribeth, the Academy was attacked. She fought against the mysterious [[mage]]s in the Graduation Chamber. It is not known if Kiki survived the attack.
